text: Sammie Okposo (30 May 1971 - 25 November 2022) was a Nigerian gospel singer who was known all over the world and won many awards. On 27 November 2022, two days after his death, Isaiah Ogedegbe described Okposo as "one of the greatest musical voices in Nigeria". ==References== Category:1971 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Nigerian gospel singers
title: Sammie Okposo
